      • isConnectedHost

        public static def isConnectedHost() : boolean 
        Description copied from class: NetworkUtil
        Replies if the host is connected.
        Returns:
        true if this host has one non-loopback address; false otherwise.

      • getPrimaryAddress

        public static def getPrimaryAddress() : InetAddress 
        Description copied from class: NetworkUtil
        Replies the first IPv4 public address. A public address is an address that is not loopback.
        Returns:
        the first public IPv4 address or null if none.

      • toURI

        public static def toURI(uri : String) : URI 
                 throws URISyntaxException
        Description copied from class: NetworkUtil
        Convert a string URI to an object URI.

        This function support the syntax ":*" for the port.

        Parameters:
        uri - the string representation of the URI to parse.
        Returns:
        the URI.
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - - if the given string has invalid format.

        Description copied from class: NetworkUtil

        Parameters:
